Information Classification: General
Figure 1 – Goldmann visual field Right eye at in 2009 (A) and 2019 (B). Left eye at in 2009 (C) and in 2019 (D) – both showing progressive nasal constriction and preservation of temporal island, typical of retinitis pigmentosa
Information Classification: General
Figure 2 – Electroretinogram showing LA cone flicker
Figure 3 - Electroretinogram showing standard and maximal flash with no measurable response
